title: 29. Tribute Reassessments, c. 426–425 BCE
description: How Athens reassessed and increased tribute during the Peloponnesian War, revealing mounting financial pressure and imperial coercion.

questions.question: In which years did the Tribute Reassessments take place?
Why did Athens reassess tribute during the Peloponnesian War?
options: Severe financial pressure from prolonged war

options: Fines for failing to collect tribute
